snippet: The early songs - including "I Saw Her Standing There" and "She Loves You" - stand apart because of a special deal made in 1963 by a New York publishing family.
abstract: The early songs - including "I Saw Her Standing There" and "She Loves You" - stand apart because of a special deal made in 1963 by a New York publishing family.

headline.main: Boutique Music Publisher Invests in Six Early Beatles Songs
